answers.answer: Hi Cheryl,We are expecting a May baby, if everything goes well. So very excited!  We never thought to be able to be parents, due to a low sperm count and me having constant problems as well (infections and such)If I can offer support/ advice or even a open ear, I am more that happy to do that. It's important to know that you aren't alone, when problems arise and that there are people who care and can relate.regardKim

I would love to be a community manager. This is our second so I do have some great experiences from last time. Also my first born does have Type 1 Diabetes so I am able to relate and help others who have older siblings that might need extra care.Just let me know what you need.All the bestJess

question: We're looking for Community Leaders for your May 2014 Babies community!Please send a message to me at:  MH Community MgrLooking forward to hearing from you soon and Congratulations!Best,CherylMH Community Mgr
title: Would you like to become a Community Leader?
